title: Fallbacks: When the Model Fails
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on Fallbacks: When the Model Fails.

hook.text: Sometimes the model fails. Great products fail gracefully.

buildup.text: Fallbacks keep users moving: a simpler model, a cached answer, or a human.

discovery.text: Define fallbacks per step: retry, simplify, ask user, or hand off.

twist.text: A fallback must be honest. Never hide uncertainty with a confident guess.
